name: Clacking Skeleton
languages: Understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Horrid Clacking
text: If the clacking skeleton moves at least 10 feet, each beast or humanoid within 30 feet of the skeleton that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The clacking skeleton makes two attacks. one with its glaive and one with its gore or two with its shortbow.

action.name: Glaive
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

action.name: Gore
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.
